column4: Yeah I figured I can do that too, I was just hoping there was a way to very simply clone over a image from one disk to another without having to go buy a thumb drive
you can copy paste with gparted, if bothare shown on it.
I was trying to do that earlier but saw no easy copy/paste across drives, just for two partitions on the same drive
has to be a equal size or larger paste I believe, uyou might be right though if one is a dropdown other dive.
